function.name: bixbyVolume_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the volume of the Voice Assistant Bixby on SmartThings devices.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set Bixby's volume.

volumeLevel.description: The desired volume level for Bixby.
